column1: The Pit Room////Its rare that I eat brisket period because 99% of the time there is no flavor
column2: but this brisket was very flavorful and the best I've ever had.  The texture wasn't dry at all.  The turkey was also flavorful and moist.  I was really impressed.  What I wasn't completely satisfied with was the jalapeno sausage.  There was not a lot of flavor to it.  In my opinion if it had just a tad bit more seasoning the sausage would be perfect but I did like the kick of jalapeno.
